mapper.select: SELECT notice_num ,club_code ,title ,mem_name ,regidate ,score ,like_num FROM ( SELECT notice_num ,club_code ,title ,mem_name ,regidate ,score ,like_num FROM ( SELECT A.notice_num, A.club_code, A.title, A.regidate, A.score, A.like_num, B.MEM_NAME mem_name FROM alto_club_notice A, ALTO_MEMBER B WHERE notice_num IN ( SELECT notice_num FROM ( SELECT recNum, notice_num FROM ( SELECT rowNum recNum, notice_num FROM ( SELECT * FROM alto_club_notice WHERE club_code = ${club_code} ORDER BY regidate desc ) ) WHERE recNum BETWEEN (#{section}-1)*100 + (#{pageNum}-1)*10+1 AND (#{section}-1)*100 + #{pageNum}*10 ) ) AND A.mem_id = B.mem_id ) ORDER BY notice_num DESC )
SELECT count(notice_num) FROM ALTO_CLUB_NOTICE WHERE CLUB_CODE = ${club_code}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ALTO_CLUB_NOTICE (CLUB_CODE, NOTICE_NUM, CATEGORY, TITLE, CONTENTS, MEM_ID, FILENAME) VALUES(#{club_code}, #{notice_num}, #{category}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{mem_id}, null)

insert.foreach: INTO ALTO_FILE(FILENO, FILENAME, NOTICE_NUM, REGDATE) VALUES (#{item.fileNO}, #{item.fileName}, #{item.notice_num}, sysdate)
